text: The 2003/04 FIS Nordic Combined World Cup was the 21st World Cup season, organized by the International Ski Federation. It started on 29 November 2003 in Kuusamo, Finland and ended on 6 March 2004 in Lahti, Finland. == Calendar == === Men === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff; font-size:86%;
